title: 为什么“联机问答”我打不开呢
author: angel725
txt_content:
502 Bad GatewayThe proxy server received an invalid response from an upstream server. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Please report this message and include the following information to us.
Thank you very much!URL:http://www.mcbbs.net/forum-multiqanda-1.htmlServer:mc-slbDate:2017/08/24 18:35:28

一打开就这样，
别的版块都能打开

replies.author: u13
replies.txt_content:
1582952890 发表于 2017-8-25 06:02
表示：多刷几遍也打不开。
forum.php?mod=forumdisplay&fid=431&orderby=dateline&filter=dateline&dateline=7948800
几个月前无聊收藏的书签，431是联机问答的板块id，7948800是3个月的秒数（60x60x24x92）
顺带综合是110, mod是266, pe是265
不过连茶馆这么多帖子都没炸，联机问答那边没理由打不开……
